events.name: Change
events.description: When the contents of the TextBox control are changed either through user interaction or programmatically.

events.name: Click
events.description: When the user clicks the TextBox control.

events.name: DblClick
events.description: When the user double-clicks the TextBox control.

events.name: GotFocus
events.description: When the TextBox control receives the focus.

events.name: KeyDown
events.description: When a key is pressed while the TextBox control has the focus.

events.name: KeyPress
events.description: When a key is pressed and released while the TextBox control has the focus.

events.name: KeyUp
events.description: When a key is released while the TextBox control has the focus.

events.name: LostFocus
events.description: When the TextBox control loses the focus.

events.name: MouseDown
events.description: When the user presses a mouse button while the pointer is over the TextBox control.

events.name: MouseMove
events.description: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the TextBox control.

events.name: MouseUp
events.description: When the user releases a mouse button that was pressed while the pointer was over the TextBox control.

events.name: Resize
events.description: When the size of the TextBox control changes.

events.name: Scroll
events.description: When the user scrolls the contents of the TextBox control.
